    General

    variables

    max-width

    $max-width: 1200px;

    Description

    Widths and base sizing

    Used by

    • [mixin] outer-container

    mixins

    xs

    @mixin xs() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - xs Breakpoint Allows easier @include xs {} syntax

    Parameters

    None.

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    small

    @mixin small() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - small Breakpoint Allows easier @include small {} syntax

    Parameters

    None.

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    @mixin xl() { ... }

    Description

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    font-size

    @mixin font-size() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - Font-Size. Adds px value for fallback - then rem value use example = @include font-size(1.6); = 1.6rem / 16px

    Parameters

    None.

    Used by

    • [mixin] more-link
    • [mixin] back-link
    • [mixin] body-copy

    clearfix

    @mixin clearfix() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - Clearfix. Adds clearfix based on http://bourbon.io/docs/#clearfix use example = @include cleafix

    Parameters

    None.

    Used by

    • [mixin] outer-container

    list-reset

    @mixin list-reset() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - list-reset Reset list item defaults when no margin, padding, list styles needed

    Parameters

    None.

    with-icon

    @mixin with-icon() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - With Icon Precede Text with SVG icon

    Parameters

    None.

    icon-bg

    @mixin icon-bg() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - Icon with circular bg Mixin for the circular icon-bg (see source/patterns/01-atoms/headings for usage)

    Parameters

    None.

    outer-container

    @mixin outer-container() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - Outer container Outer container mixin for large screens

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [mixin] clearfix
    • [variable] max-width

    more-link

    @mixin more-link() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - More Link Used in a number of views

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [mixin] font-size

    back-link

    @mixin back-link() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin - Back Link Used in a number of views

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [mixin] font-size
